q: | Chrysler weighs changes to minivans Chrysler is debating the future of its Dodge Grand Caravan and its Chrysler Town and Country minivans. "We need to completely rethink the minivan," CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. Michael Jordan fuse is real short anyway, and Elgin Baylor should have known that Elgin Baylor couldn't say anything anyway. Mike Pence of Indiana and Greg Walden of Oregon unveiled this week the Broadcaster Freedom Act, which would ban the FCC from forcing broadcasters to give free airtime to opposing sides on controversial issues. The American people cherish freedom, especially freedom of speech and of the press, said Mike Pence , a former radio talk show host who introduced the same bill in the last session of Congress when Democrats still controlled the House. . Hemmed in by a strict curfew, Zahi Hawass spent the night at home fretting about the fate of his country's treasures. "Of course I was so worried," he said. I have been protecting antiquities all my life. I felt if the Cairo museum is robbed, Egypt will never be able to get up again. Early Saturday, Zahi Hawass fought the mobs to reach the museum.
